attributes.action: Say YES to CAPPING Public Sector Pensions
attributes.additional_details:
The provision of Pensions is not the problem, all good governments and businesses should have them.

The problem is that Public Sector Pensions (PSPs) have moved away from their original purpose of providing a BENEFIT necessary to support a person who has become too old or employable to justify the payment of a full income.

The problem is that PSPs are no longer a BENEFIT but a LUXURIOUS means of continuing to live beyond what is necessary.

Say YES to capping PSPs.
